description: While cropping your video you must be aware of fact that the crop will function only if the cropped video's play duration is greater than the frame duration you've set for your slides. Meaning, if you've set the frame duration to 5 seconds, then cropping the video to a length of 4 seconds will not be accepted by the system and it will play the video to its original length.
description_text: While cropping your video you must be aware of fact that the crop will function only if the cropped video's play duration is greater than the frame duration you've set for your slides. Meaning, if you've set the frame duration to 5 seconds, then cropping the video to a length of 4 seconds will not be accepted by the system and it will play the video to its original length.
title: Why can't I crop my video-clip as desired?
